meanings.definition: The first appearance of light in the sky before sunrise.
meanings.sent1: The dawnings brought a soft glow to the horizon.
meanings.sent2: We watched the dawnings slowly illuminate the world.
meanings.sent3: The dawnings played peek-a-boo with the stars.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the dawnings of a new day, full of promise.
meanings.sent5: The dawnings painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.

meanings.definition: The beginning or early stages of something.
meanings.sent1: In the dawnings of their friendship, they shared many secrets.
meanings.sent2: The dawnings of a new project are always exciting.
meanings.sent3: The dawnings of a plan started forming in his mind.
meanings.sent4: The dawnings of spring brought new life to the garden.
meanings.sent5: The dawnings of understanding slowly crept into her mind.
